“HDX Signals is saving us time and money. It was
pivotal to helping us secure grants with ECHO, USAID
and UNICEF. For the first time, we had the information
and funding we needed to act immediately.”
-Mohammed Bannama Mohammed, GOALPrime Nigeria’s Data Analysis Coordinator
